name: Social Skew Bar
author: Rishi

sections.description:
There are lot of Social Plugins that help you integrate your WordPress Blog with Social Media sites, Social Skew Bar is a new concept of Social Media Plugin.

Social Skew Bar includes Twitter, Facebook and Google Plus integration and displays them statically on the top of your wordpress blog. It will be on the top while you scroll the page.

Why I need Social Skew Bar plugin ?

This plugin is helpful in many ways, it helps you spread your blog on social media sites which will help you getting traffic. It also helps to improve seo of your blog as google considers social factors while ranking your articles.

More WordPress Resources:

  • WordPress SEO
  • Backup WordPress

Social Skew Bar WordPress Plugin written by Rishi of Web Design Blog. For support, you can send a tweet to @designskew.
sections.installation:
Here’s how you to install the plugin:

  1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your Facebook Page URL and Twitter Handler in “Your Profile” Page. 1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
Facebook and Twitter follow buttons are not showing ?

You need to enter your Facebook Page URL and Twitter username in “Your Profile” Page.

short_description: Social Skew Bar displays a static social sharing bar on the top of you blog.
